attributes.action: please ignore any petitions that discriminate against Pagans or have an anti-Pagan bias
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition comes from reading too many petitions written by people who seem to think that it is somehow right to create petitions that discriminate against Pagans or have an anti-Pagan bias. We Pagans should have the same rights and considerations afforded to us as any other faith group in this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
